address: 100 W 124th St, New York, NY 10027, United States
name: Harlem Shake

reviews.review: The burger and curly fries were really good but when I got home I realized that y'all forgot the bacon and mayo.
Sent the completely wrong shakes. Werent even good. Worst chipotle mayo ive had too. Liked the burger but how badly the order was messed up aint worth it. Wasted my money
Love this place.  Great food but I really come for the music.  And the champagne is to die for!
Shakeshack who?!?! Harlem shake was always better. I'm sad they closed their "secret" east harlem location but this location is just as friendly and welcoming. Can't wait to see you in Brooklyn
Loved it. The food was and they had a smooth R&B live band that was awesome.
The service was horrible
live band and great singer and food was good ; Snoop dog;  is chilli and cheese on a hot dog  and curly fries and Oreo shake  and tex message for food;  wail jamming to music. Good time!
Fantastic food!
Enjoyed the outdoor dining and art work displayed.
Too expensive for friggin burgers and fries. No A/C either but the staff was very nice.
Love the burgers, the fries, the shakes. Great fast service. Good ambiance.
Amazing burgers and fries.  The cookies & cream milk shake was awesome.  A really great place to eat in Harlem!!
Its really some mid far as there burgers go, but the set up is nice its not expensive.
Fried chicken sandwich was delicious - tender and cooked just right. I ordered it earlier in late morning for delivery at 12  and delivery was at 12. Thank you!!

Food was pretty good, didn't like that they call your name or text you to pick up your own food with so many workers walking around. And don't get a table outside towards the sidewalk, unless you don't mind the occasional random homeless person interrupting your meal!
Great food and ambiance
Has a very tasty cheeseburger and fresh, delicious fries.  The burger tasted like it was homemade!
Great food . Live entertainment on Sunday
I love their milk shakes

Worst place ever. They got my order wrong. I called to tell them about it. The lady on the phone was rude and did not care about customer service. Nothing good will ever come to that place until they treat their customers better. Will never order there again.
Best Burger I have had in years and that red velvet shake is something special! 5 stars!
Why are the cooks not wearing masks????
The atmosphere and the burgers are the best. A must to experience.
That have vegan options *plural*

Though a little pricey,  the burger and shake were very good. However, a little annoyance was that you had to specifically request lettuce, tomatoes, and onions the basics for a burger. Since I didn't know this, I had to receive it on the side.

I absolutely love the vibes here the music is on point love the playlist the food it's okay it's a little expensive but it's really good the staff is nice but it could get a little crowded and rowdy at some point
Had the Hot Mess which was EXCELLENT.
Good food had too many flies
I liked its milkshakes and the burgers. The staff was friendly and I got my food at a reasonable time.
Great atmosphere, the food was fantastic (I recommend the hot mess burger), and it was really affordable. I'll definitely be back.
Sundays are the Best. Music with good food

I come here all the time so I would give it 5 stars but my experience just now was horrible. I'm still in here waiting for my order to be fixed. This new guy I think his name is Constantine I really can't read his name tag. However he kept
This is fine, but honestly not as good as you think it will be. Their regular fries aren't very good, so get the curly ones instead.
Nice spot loved it great food
Wow burger wow shake wow good. Wow wow wow ...
Love their frose
The burger is very simple and is really good, highly recommended
The drink I had was called their Signature Harlem Shake and it was DELICIOUS. The cheese burger and fries were very tasty and satisfying.
The burgers here are pretty great and I would recommend you try them out.  They have a great menu selection and the prices are very reasonable.
Wait to long expansive

Service is so-so, during the summer here in Harlem you can't enjoy the atmosphere because there is no central air conditioning to keep cool, the food was horrible due to net keeping up with replacing the spoiled food with fresh ones and
Omg I'm addicted to there cheeseburgers with the curly fries and the spicy mayo it comes with just tops off the whole meal.

If youre going to have coffee written on your light up sign outdoor, I expect to be able to order coffee. I was told this was not a coffee place when I went to order and instead was recommended a coffee shake. It was $10 ( alcoholic with
Taste good
Food is really bad, I ordered through Uber eats and it wasnt a pleasant experience.... they forgot one of our drinks and the fries were extremely salty and overly seasoned.

reviews.user: Jeff Johnson (The Name You Can Trust!)
reviews.review: The food was good and the shakes were AWESOME!!!
Great burgers, fries and shakes!
Not worth what you pay for. Expensive little portions

The food is always great but terrible because they didn't tell us that they didn't have heat like they usually do to sit outside and we was freezing. It wasn't pleasant eating while you was freezing. Fix that problem unless you want to
The food is very delicious and the staff are very friendly.

I returned to Harlem Shake today because I had such a great time there a few weeks ago, but I hadnt tried the food.  As previously, we were greeted by the dynamic bundle of positive energy that is C. Kelly Wright.  It is impossible not to
That Impossible Burger! Hunnnyyy!!!!
A must try if visiting!Try the hot mess
Classic Harlem good food great music!
great place to eat a good burger

As someone else so eloquently said previously, segregation is gross. The CDC guideline they quoted as the reason for their thoughtless signage was not even mandatory, simply advisory. Instead of having the generic "masks not required for

Horrible experience. DO NOT ORDER FOOD FROM THEM. Did an Uber eats order with them on 6/9/2021. Not only did we have missing items but the burger was dry, looked disgusting and bad. The customer service is horrible as well.

They using vaccination to seperate customers and this is uncalled for. People should not be ridiculed for taking the vaccine or choosing not to. We already know it has harmful effects and those who are eating ar the restaurant already can
I had a little issue ,with my order the manager, the manager resolved the issue great customer service I will go back for my Jamaican Jerk Burger Delicious
Great local Harlem spot! I go here way too often! If you go during a lunch or dinner rush, you may have to wait a bit, but it's totally worth it. Delicious burgers, curly fries, and truffle fries!
Good service! The shakes are a tasteful delight. The burgers and fries were pretty good. Overall the food was hot and taste good!
I love Harlem Shake! Their chocolate milkshake is amazing!! Harlem shake has a courteous staff which fills the environment with laughter and culture.
Good good good burger! Didnt have the shake I wanted.

I went during elite week And because of my elite Yelp status I  was given a comp meal which included a  hot mess hamburger. Jerk fries and froze . I ended up purchasing a separate hot honey chicken Sammich and I was extra satisfied!
Food was hot and fresh. Customer service was good as well. Would def recommend
Good food good service
Had truffle fries and a shake both were good. The Music was good. Took a little long. Overall good
Great hamburgers and milkshakes.
Great vibe. Great tasting burgers. Will be back!
was really good.
Love the jerk burger & the jerk fries.
The burgers here are really freaking good and the menu selection is awesome. Only problem are the prices, It might cost you an arm and leg.
Super good service and food
Overpriced food and fries were cold didnt taste all that good but was not nasty either
It was cool..
The place is very nice,the service is not like before..slow
I was cool and not crowded. There was seating inside and outside. The service was congenial.
Amazing shakes. Love their jerk fries, burgers, and sandwiches. Harlem staple.
Nice food. Great service!!!!

Food is good, some of the best chicken in Harlem, but ordering for delivery or pickup is not their best feature. First delivery a few months ago was more than an hour late -- and not even warm. Now that we live 5 blocks away, we tried

Burgers was amazing. Shake was okay. 1 burger plus 1 shake = $20 so be prepared to spend money. Also, be aware of the menu stating one price and then they charging you another price. Customer Service? ... the workers should get more training on that .. the workers can be GHETTO at times. Overall, I'll return.

Really great shakes and burgers amazing workers, a lot of young people working so you have to check your order, one slim tall girl had an attitude  and said if people don't move she's going to flip out, other than that it's a really great place
Ive visited twice so far. There burgers are delicious!I enjoy the overall decor as well as the kindness of the majority of staff.It has a modern feel with LOTS of history.
I love the impossible burger and Jerk Fries! Excellent!
Great service
Their hamburgers were out of this world
Great & fast  service during this covid situation
Ok burgers.
One of the best service I ever get.
Solid burgers served smash style. No service in the indoor part kinda turned me off, but decor is awesome and has great vibes. Worth swinging by at least once if you're in the hood
A Harlem classic.
I love the
You just gotta get it. No reason to miss out.
Impossible burger + shake with a whisky shot? They got it
Food is great. Lights were too dim though, which kind of put a funk in the mood.
It was my 1st time there to eat. I enjoyed it mucho much
Good burger, fast service at a fair price.
Imagine walking into the 40s and 50s where the Jet magazine plastered all over the bathroom walls and the seatings have that Grease feel where Danny and Sandy sit across each other.
Very friendly and professional service. Amazing food and great shakes. They will accommodate your needs. We loved it.
Always amazing
Awesome fresh burgers, staff was superb, and we love stopping by. Food is a bit pricey though, and its always top-notch.
Food was delicious. Ordered online and picked up. Not too much of a wait even though they were busy.
They are lovely people, and they cook amazing, I know it's a burguer...but c'mon! They know how make a good burger! Thanks!
Nice staff, food was good too.  Strawberry shake tastes like vanilla  Other than that I like the place
The food was OK but I loved the history of it.
I had a watermelon cooler and curly fries So good I haven't stopped thinking about them..
Nice atmosphere for a quick bite. Love how average burger joint staples are named in the menu. Good milk shake and drink options as well.
Excellent plant burger and truffle fries! Nice service with a smilePeace
Nice and relaxing, I could go there every weekend. Wait till the weather breaks its the place to be.
This place is really good and consistent!  Always eat a little too much. ;)
Delicious  dessert  and food
Very flavorful thick milkshakes. they're soooooo good
Great food and froze'
The watermelon cooler is so refreshing.
Hamburger are good, shakes not so good, fries are okey. I didnt know that I had to pay extra for tomatoes and lettuce so I need to go back again to the cashier to add it.

Come here every time I'm in Harlem. Definitely the best burgers and shakes in Harlem. Plenty of extras to customize your burger and delicious boozy milkshakes. Dining in needs to be reevaluated . The old school diner concept mixed with
Love it. A NYC must. Chocolate malt, burger with bacon, grilled mushrooms, onions, and cedar is a Five Star Burger.
I've been frequenting this establishment since they opened. Many great memories made here. The staff is always excellent and friendly. Thank you guys for your service!!
Pricey but soo good. Milkshakes burgers fries are all great. Reminds me of shake shack burgers but a little different in a good way.
The SHAKE is life.
the red velvet shake is my favorite
Best burgers and fries in Harlem. We've ordered from there a lot during this pandemic and honestly it's been incredible every time we go there. 5/5 stars!!
It's a Must to try their Milkshake, whatever it is!
Good for for inexpensive price, dope vibe too

Would love to see this place in a normal, non-pandemic setting bc the inside looks so fun. Very nice, warm, ventilated tent for safe outdoor dining. Definitely a good greasy spoon. Good burger, sweet potato fries and shake. Although the
Cashiers Respectful and the food is delicious
Burgers were great and fries and shake were good as well
Their food is really good. And customer service is on point
Never eaten there
2nd rate shake shack with awful customer service. Avoid.

Foodies alike beware it's horrible and not worth the money; especially if hungry hungry. Went there today for the first time and it was bad. The fries taste like old potatoes and soggy not fresh and crispy like other fast food places. The chicken fingers were hard as rock. And the chickpea salad was weird looking. Waste of money.
Harlem Shake, cookies n cream and grilled cheese...all delicious!
Goos food nice place
It's worth the trip to visit and dine every time I'm in New York City!
You can get some good burgers here. So far Hot Mess, Jerk Burger are my favorites. There milkshakes are thick and tasty. O and the chili cheese fries are good too.
Best burger I've ever had, get the hot mess. I'm not even a burger fan.  And the shakes, with every calorie!
Food waa good and inexpensive.
Personable, pleasant and delicious
Food amazing
Best burgers in the city
We went Sunday for the live music & vocalists in outside heated & enclosed side walk patio.
Nice service nice place

This restaurant is a must visit when in NYC. Iconic for its history but also a very nice and diverse menu even for the vegetarian. Sometimes a live band and the staff are so friendly. Bring your friends and look at the wall of celebrities who visited the Harlem Shake. Now, go have some fun.

Good customer service however they will refuse your order 30 minutes before they close. It needs to be more brown employees. Like spanish and black or indian even asian because A young lady who works there acts as if she hates people in general and the neighborhood. The food is delicious
I never knew this place existed so I was pleasantly surprised when my friend took me here. Food is good though pricey. Highly recommend if you're in Harlem. Love that they have vegetarian options
Good food but when I say no sauce they always put sauce on my burger.
always good
Great burger and shake
This place is amazing! In my list of top 5 burgers and fries. Especially the sweet yam fries! Check them out!

So I ordered this ahead of time through google's ordering system. For whatever reason it uses the delivery.com app even though Harlem Shake uses every ordering system. So I arrived to pick up my food and they had no history of my order on

This place is doubtless one of the most pleasant restaurants in the neighborhood. Anytime I come to this place I am highly happy. They maintain their high  standard service and the topmost level of food  they serve. You no doubt will love this restaurant. Very  recommended.
Had the classic fried chicken sandwich....nice juicy breast and soft bun...jus Poppin
Very wonderful place to go and eat lunch!
This used to be a good location with great service and hot fresh food
I love this diner, IMO one of the best in the city! Its unpretentious, but has solid food. I always have their veggie burgers and fries, and for the price it cant be beaten!

Awesome place for a burguer and a shake. They dont make the burguer rare because the kind of meat i think is different but it is tasty though. I dont give 5 stars because the mayo and ketchup envelops were dirty.
This place is love on a bun
Foods really good,  and they have quality control. So you will always get the right
This place reminded me of Mendocino farms. Very cute, spacious place with a rustic/hipster vibe. It's right across the courthouse and easy to miss amongst the surrounding businesses in Van Nuys.
I spent $15 on truffle fries and a small shake. But then they messed up my order and gave me normal fries. I could get the same thing at mcdonalds for like $2
Food is fresh and delicious, it's a burger but I bet you can't replicate this fresh light burger at home especially not the turkey burger
Price to high for me but the food is good
Most of my food was cold.
I like it when I see it
Good burgers good people
Good fuud
Ambiance was nice. Fries were good. Burger patties lacked flavor & milkshakes were semi-ok. Wouldnt go back but it wasnt the worst burger joint out there.

If you like or are even familiar with shake shack you will love Harlem Shake even more. Not only is the classic burger really good in the size it is but all not being dry or over cooked, you really have a variety of unique options to choose
Great I was so excited to go and eat

Had a great time celebrating my wife's Birthday with family. The food was great and the customer service outstanding. Their staff had to deal with kids coming in to Trick or Treat and all of the customers orders. But they handled it very well. Thank you Harlem Shake. We were very happy customers.
Great place
Awesome food great shake try peanut butter shake
Holy mackerel. I went here right after the gym. #icheated #diet
Good food. Fast service.  Delivery is sometime wrong but they always fix it.
I WISH I COULD GIVE THIS PLACE NEGATIVE STARS. I also wish I had two more hands. To give it 4 thumbs down.
Great service great food
The food was good and there was a live band

I'm not really sure why they even bother with their delivery estimate times. I've ordered delivery 3 times and each time it's been outrageously late. I was really craving some cheese fries, so I hoping that number 4 would be different
Yummy. Love the chicken sandwich

The classic burger was very good and tasty and worth it. I got curly fries along with and strawberry shake so worth it , so coming back again  this was my second time here, first time i ordered a kids grill cheese which was cheese on
This was a great treat for my sons and the food was delicious! I had a freshly my veggie burger that made my day! The boys loved the shakes!
Nice
The burgers, fries and shakes were fantastic! Can't wait to go back!
A lot of history, and the burgers are to die for
